definition: the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
yes
-ism/only/alone
thing/object/matter/abbr. for physics 物理
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: The body that he, the materialist, had treated so contumeliously took its revenge on him.
sentences.chinese: 这位唯物论者曾极度蔑视肉体，如今肉体对他了报复。
唯心论和唯物论是对立的。

sentences.english: You have to go to materialism and dialectics.
sentences.chinese: 你必须采取唯物论和辩证法的方法。

sentences.english: The theory of traditional Chinese medicine has been deeply influenced by classical Chinese materialism and dialectics .
sentences.chinese: 中医药学受古代唯物论和辩证法的深刻影响。

sentences.english: Anti- materialists tend to deride the importance of "things."
sentences.chinese: 反唯物论者往往会瞧不起物质的重要性。

sentences.english: Your lawyers are always so materialistic.
sentences.chinese: 你们律师总是唯物论者。

sentences.english: We must study dialectical materialism so that we can use it to guide our work.
sentences.chinese: 我们要认真学习辩证唯物论，用以指导实践。

sentences.english: I am hardworking and am non-materialistic.
sentences.chinese: 我是勤勉和上午非唯物论。

sentences.english: VOICE: Is he saying that all science is materialistic or atheistic ?
sentences.chinese: 那他是说所有的科学都是唯物论或是无神论的？

sentences.english: From the viewpoint of the dialectical materialism, form and content are not separated.
sentences.chinese: 按照辩证唯物论的观点，形式和内容是不可分离的。

sentences.english: Spiritualism, then, suitably stands opposed to materialism.
sentences.chinese: 唯心论，那么，适当地站在反对唯物论。

sentences.english: Over the past several years, the momentum has shifted away from hard-core materialism. The brain seems less like a cold machine.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的几年中，绝对唯物论大势已去。

definition: materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
dialectical materialism
pinyin: bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: materialistic
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
historical materialism (Marx's theory of history)
pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
dialectics/dialectic or Socratic method of debate
theism (the belief in the existence of God)
metaphysics
objective idealism (in Hegel's philosophy)
pinyin: ke4 guan1 wei2 xin1 zhu3 yi4

definition: Marxism
monism, belief that the universe is made of a single substance
dualism, belief that the universe is made of two different substance (e.g. mind and matter or good and evil)
gnosticism, the philosophical doctrine that everything about the universe is knowable
theory of reflection (in dialectic materialism), i.e. every perception reflects physical reality
